sub_title: Founder & Chief Trendwatcher of Supply Chain Media
summary:
In a rapidly developing and changing world Martijn Lofvers has developed several concepts for the visualization of complex subjects. He has created several innovative content formats about supply chain management, such as:
• Subway Maps (with software vendors, consulting firms, and logistics companies in Europe)
• Mind Maps (Digital Supply Chain, Sales & Operations Planning, Sustainable Supply Chain and more)
• Visualization of Ecosystems
• End-to-End Supply Chain Visibility self-assessment
• The Strategy Compass for the alignment with Supply Chain and Operations
• The Trend Compass for the alignment of innovation drivers and successful implementations

With his years of experience as trend watcher he has developed a concept to link Company Strategy to Supply Chain Strategy with the use of a practicial mind map for the often lacking communication purposes. He facilitates executive workshops about this matter and has done this for several well-known multinationals in Europe.

Martijn Lofvers has excellent connections with European supply chain executives and with the academic world (like MIT in Boston and IMD business school in Lausanne). Through this network his company Supply Chain Media establishes an actual exchange of supply chain experience and knowledge.
